info: To create one choose the 'The Demon' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until Lv. 10 where you will be given the choice to choose between the 'Demon Avenger' or 'Demon Slayer' classes. You can also choose to skip the cutscenes at the beginning to go straight into choosing between the two classes

build: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/life-sap.png} tip={Life Sap}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/demonic-veracity.png} tip={Demonic Veracity}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/overload-release.png} tip={Overload Release}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-double-slash.png} tip={Exceed: Double Slash}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/rage-within.png} tip={Rage Within}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/unbreakable-steel.png} tip={Unbreakable Steel}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/desperado-mastery.png} tip={Desperado Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/agile-demon.png} tip={Agile Demon}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/abyssal-connection.png} tip={Abyssal Connection}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-demon-strike.png} tip={Exceed: Demon Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/bat-swarm.png} tip={Bat Swarm}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/advanced-life-sap.png} tip={Advanced Life Sap}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/pain-dampener.png} tip={Pain Dampener}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/diabolic-recovery.png} tip={Diabolic Recovery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/ward-evil.png} tip={Ward Evil}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-lunar-slash.png} tip={Exceed: Lunar Slash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/vitality-veil.png} tip={Vitality Veil}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/shield-charge.png} tip={Shield Charge}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/infernal-exceed.png} tip={Infernal Exceed}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/advanced-desperado-mastery.png} tip={Advanced Desperado Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/overwhelming-power.png} tip={Overwhelming Power}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/defense-expertise.png} tip={Defense Expertise}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/nether-shield.png} tip={Nether Shield}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-execution.png} tip={Exceed: Execution}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/blood-prison.png} tip={Blood Prison}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/nether-slice.png} tip={Nether Slice}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/limits-surpassed.png} tip={Limits Surpassed}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-reinforce.png} tip={Exceed - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-reduce-overload.png} tip={Exceed - Reduce Overload}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-opportunity.png} tip={Exceed - Opportunity}> Exceed - Reinforce, Reduce Overload, and Opportunity_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/nether-shield-reinforce.png} tip={Nether Shield - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/nether-shield-spread.png} tip={Nether Shield - Spread}> Nether Shield - Reinforce and Spread_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-execution.png} tip={Exceed: Execution (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/nether-shield.png} tip={Nether Shield (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/infernal-exceed.png} tip={Infernal Exceed (4th Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-lunar-slash.png} tip={Exceed: Lunar Slash (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/thousand-swords.png} tip={Thousand Swords (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/bat-swarm.png} tip={Bat Swarm (2nd Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-double-slash.png} tip={Exceed: Double Slash (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-demon-strike.png} tip={Exceed: Demon Strike (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/bat-swarm.png} tip={Bat Swarm (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-lunar-slash.png} tip={Exceed: Lunar Slash (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/vitality-veil.png} tip={Vitality Veil (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/shield-charge.png} tip={Shield Charge (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-execution.png} tip={Exceed: Execution (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/nether-shield.png} tip={Nether Shield (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/nether-slice.png} tip={Nether Slice (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/blood-prison.png} tip={Blood Prison (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/infernal-exceed.png} tip={Infernal Exceed (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/thousand-swords.png} tip={Thousand Swords (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Kerkerseele and the members of the Demon Avenger Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: Exceed Mechanic
content: Demon Avengers use HP for their attacks and do not have an MP resource. As well, instead of scaling off of STR like regular warriors, Demon Avengers' damage scales off of HP

Using attacks labelled with 'Exceed' grants a stacking debuff called Overload (up to 20 stacks). At max stacks and for every 2 stacks, <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/life-sap.png} tip={Life Sap (1st Job)}> Life Sap (1st Job) effectiveness will be reduced

Additionally, repeatedly using Exceed attacks in quick succession will result in entering 'Exceed Mode', increasing the Attack Speed and HP Cost of the Exceed skills. Some skills also gain increased range or increased number of hits per attack

To reset your Overload stacks, you can use <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/overload-release.png} tip={Overload Release (1st Job)}> Overload Release (1st Job) to restore your HP and increase your %Final Damage based on the number of Overload stacks consumed

primary.name: Dark Winds
primary.shortDesc: High Jump: Press the up arrow key twice during a jump\nJag Jump: Press the right or left arrow key twice during a jump\nGlide: Jump Key (Maintain Press)
details: Right-click the skill to toggle gliding<bp_When on, you can perform a double jump but pressing the Jump Key twice instead_>

primary.name: Demonic Blood
primary.shortDesc: Willpower: Lv. 20, Ambition: Lv. 20, Knockback Resistance: +100%

primary.name: Exceed
primary.shortDesc: Life Sap -1% for every 20 Exceed Overload cap and 2 Overload stacks.\nOverload +1 when another Exceed skill is used while Exceed skill is in use.\nUsing Overload Release reduces the Exceed levels to half.
primary.desc: Using an Exceed attack applies a stacking self-debuff called "Overload" (up to 20 stacks). Repeatedly using Exceed attacks will cause you to enter Exceed Mode
details: [Overload]: At max stacks and for every 2 stacks, <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/life-sap.png} tip={Life Sap (1st Job)}> effectiveness will be reduced

[Exceed Mode]: Using Exceed attacks up to 5 times in quick succession will increase the Attack Speed and HP Cost of the Exceed skills<bp_Additionally for your 1st - 3rd Job Exceed attacks, it also increases their range_For your 4th Job Exceed attack, increases the number of hits per attack_Upon using <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/overload-release.png} tip={Overload Release (1st Job)}>, Exceed levels will reduced by half_>

primary.name: Hyper Potion Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Potion Recovery Rate: +200%
details: Affects percentage recovery-based items too

primary.name: Star Force Conversion
primary.shortDesc: Max HP increases proportional to the Star Force on your equipped items

primary.name: Blood Pact
primary.shortDesc:
Damage calculated based on Max HP.
Only a set percentage of Bonus HP from Equipment items are applied.
Base HP confers a greater damage bonus than HP bonuses from equipment and items.
Allows you to ignore stat requirements on Warrior and Demon Avenger equipment.
In situations where HP cannot be recovered, HP consumed by the 1st through 4th tier job skills will be reduced by 90%.
primary.desc: Your damage is calculated based on your Max HP
details: You also ignore the stat requirements of Warrior equipment
Base HP increases damage more than HP bonuses from equipment and items
HP consumption of 1st to 4th Job skills are reduced when HP cannot be recovered<bp_For example, bosses that prevent HP recovery and potion use_>

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: Increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/16/Love_Lost,_but_not_Forgotten} title={"Love Lost, but not Forgotten"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Exceed: Double Slash
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 1%, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 8

primary.name: Overload Release
primary.shortDesc: Resets Overload to 0. Duration: 90 sec, Final damage: +15%, Max HP Restored: 100%\n20% of overall HP restored even when under the effect of certain statuses (not including the recovery reductions from Demonic Frenzy or the ones within Ghost Park).
primary.desc: Release all stacks of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed.png} tip={Exceed (Beginner Skill)}> Overload and restores %Max HP while granting a %Final Damage buff
details: HP restore is reduced when under recovery restriction statuses (not including <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/demonic-frenzy.png} tip={Demonic Frenzy (5th Job)}> or in Ghost Park)

primary.name: Life Sap
primary.shortDesc: 100% chance to recover 5% HP on hit

primary.name: Demonic Veracity
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +45, Max Speed: +20, Jump: +20, Critical Rate: +15%

primary.name: Exceed: Demon Strike
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 1%, Damage: 125%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 10
primary.desc: Dash forward while slicing through enemies

primary.name: Bat Swarm
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 1% of Max HP, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 40.\nThe cloud expires once you finish attacking, move a certain distance, or its timer runs out. Press the skill key again to change direction.
primary.desc: Summon a swarm of bats that damages enemies it passes through
details: Pressing the Skill Key changes the directions of the bat's movement
Bats expire once it moves a certain distance, or its timer runs out

primary.name: Agile Demon
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, Max HP: +400

primary.name: Abyssal Connection
primary.shortDesc: ATT: +40, Critical Rate: +20%

primary.name: Unbreakable Steel
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Defense by 100%.

primary.name: Desperado Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Desperado Mastery by 50%.

primary.name: Rage Within
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Max HP by 600 and Defense by 500

primary.name: Exceed: Lunar Slash
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 3%, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 10

primary.name: Vitality Veil
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost per attack: 100, Enemies hit with Key Pressed: 12, Damage: 300%, HP Restored: 10%.\nExplosion Damage: 1000%\nCooldown: 12 sec
primary.desc: When held, continuously damage nearby enemies around you
details: At the end of the attack, the skill explodes

primary.name: Shield Charge
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 2% of Max HP, Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 2.\nEnemies Hit After Charge: 12, Damage After Charge: 200%
primary.desc: Dash forward and push enemies along with you
details: Has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Ward Evil
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 900, Duration: 180 sec, Elemental Resistance: +50%, Status Resistance: +50, Damage Intake: -30%

primary.name: Diabolic Recovery
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 900, Duration: 180 sec, Max HP: +25%. Restores 5% HP every 4 sec

primary.name: Pain Dampener
primary.shortDesc: Exceed Overload HP Absorption Penalty: -2%, Exceed Damage: +20%
primary.desc: Reduces the penalty to <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/life-sap.png} tip={Life Sap (1st Job)}> from <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed.png} tip={Exceed (Beginner Skill)}> and increases the %Damage of Exceed Skills

primary.name: Advanced Life Sap
primary.shortDesc: Increases Life Sap's absorption amount boosted to 10% of Max HP, Overload Release's final damage increase amount boosted to 25%.
primary.desc: Increases the healing from <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/life-sap.png} tip={Life Sap (1st Job)}> and increases the %Final Damage provided from <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/overload-release.png} tip={Overload Release (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Exceed: Execution
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 4%, Damage: 540%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 2. Enemy DEF Ignored: 30%.
primary.desc: Slash forwarda at up to 2 enemies
details: Attack also have increases %Ignore DEF
Exceed Mode increases number of hits per attack (by 2)

primary.name: Nether Shield
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 8% of Max HP, Shields: 2, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 2, Attacks per Shield: 8.\nCooldown: 6 sec\n[Passive Effect: Exceed: Lunar Slash Damage: +330% points]
primary.desc: Launch homing shields that seek and attack enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-lunar-slash.png} tip={Exceed: Lunar Slash (3rd Job)}> by a flat amount
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Nether Slice
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 1000, Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 4, Debuff Duration: 60 sec, Enemy DEF: -30%\n[Passive Effect: Exceed: Demon Strike Damage: +155% points]
details: [Debuff]: Reduces %DEF<bp_Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF_>
[Passive]: Increases the %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-demon-strike.png} tip={Exceed: Demon Strike (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount

primary.name: Blood Prison
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 5000, Max Enemies Hit: 14, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 3, Stun Duration: 10 sec.\nStun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Blood Prison.\nCooldown: 120 sec
primary.desc: Unleash an attack that binds nearby enemies

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 1000, Goddess of Tynerum appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%, Max HP: +15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: The Demon's Will
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Limits Surpassed
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 1000, Duration: 24 sec, Skill HP Consumption: 0\nCooldown: 60 sec

primary.name: Overwhelming Power
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +15%, Damage: +30%, Ignore Defense: +30%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Defense Expertise
primary.shortDesc: Shield Charge and Nether Shield Damage: +20%, Ignore Defense: +30%
details: Increases %Damage and %Ignore DEF of attacks

primary.name: Advanced Desperado Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Desperado Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +50, Critical Damage: +8%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Infernal Exceed
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Chance to deliver an extra attack after Exceed: 70%, Damage: 200%, Bonus Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 2
primary.desc: Using <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed.png} tip={Exceed (Beginner Skill)}> Exceed Skills have a chance to deal an additional attack

hyperPassive.name: Exceed - Reduce Overload
hyperPassive.desc: Reduces max Overload stacks from 20 to 18

hyperPassive.name: Exceed - Opportunity
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the chance for <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/infernal-exceed.png} tip={Infernal Exceed (4th Job)}> to activate

hyperPassive.name: Nether Shield - Spread
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Permanently increases the max number of attacks per Nether Shield by 2.

hyperActive.name: Forbidden Contract
hyperActive.shortDesc: HP Cost: 5000, Duration: 24 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 60 sec

hyperActive.name: Thousand Swords
hyperActive.shortDesc: Max HP Cost: 15%, Exceed Overload: +5, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 14\nCooldown: 8 sec
hyperActive.desc: Release a flurry of attacks around you
details: Upon use, increases <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed.png} tip={Exceed (Beginner Skill)}> Overload stacks

hyperActive.name: Demonic Fortitude
hyperActive.shortDesc: HP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

fifthMain.name: Demonic Frenzy
fifthMain.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 20% of Max HP, consumes 6000 HP per sec, Healing Restriction: Items and skills can only heal 2% of Max HP, hit damage -30% (including the damage proportional to Max HP)
Final Damage: +1% and can be increased up to 13% per 2% HP consumed. Your demonic blood, burning with vengeance, lingers in the area, periodically dealing 740% damage on up to 10 enemies 3 times
When your HP falls below 30%, the HP loss will cease, and Demonic Frenzy will no longer restrict your healing.
Reusing this skill during its effect will deactivate that effect.
Cooldown: 1 sec
fifthMain.desc: While toggled, gain increased %Final Damage and create a damaging aura around you
details: Costs HP to activate and drains HP each sec while active
Items and skills can only recover 2% Max HP but you take reduced damage (including %Max HP attacks)
When your HP falls below 30%, your HP will no longer drain and will no longer have any healing restrictions
Pressing the Skill Key again ends the skill early

fifthMain.name: Demonic Blast
fifthMain.shortDesc: Consumes 3% of Max HP, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1595%, Number of Attacks: 12. For attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of the target's Max HP, Damage -30%.\nHP Recovery: 25% of Max HP, Additional Critical Rate: 100%, Additional Ignore Defense: 100%\nCooldown: 12 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Release an explosion that damages nearby enemies
details: If the attack defeats an enemy or hits a boss, restore some %Max HP<bp_HP recovered is not affected by <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/demonic-frenzy.png} tip={Demonic Frenzy (5th Job)}> or Ghost Park_>
While casting, increases %Damage Reduction including %Max HP attacks
The attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit and will have 100% Ignore DEF
Can be used while using other skills

fifthMain.name: Dimensional Sword
fifthMain.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 20% of Max HP. Summon a magic sword for 40 sec every 3 sec. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 2585%, Number of Attacks: 15
The skill duration becomes 1/5 if the skill is used again while summoning, but the magic sword will spin quickly and deal 1100% damage to 8 enemies 10 times.
All Dimensional Sword hits receive Defense Ignored: +100%
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon swords that hover above you and periodically slashes forward at nearby enemies
details: While active, pressing the Skill Key again will reduce the summon duration but the swords will continuously spin around you dealing damage to nearby enemies
Attack has 100% Ignore DEF
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Revenant
fifthMain.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 50% of Current HP, Duration: 15 sec
When using the Exceed skill, activates Thorn of Fury, which damages 5 enemies with 1320% damage 12 time(s). Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +30%, Cooldown: 4 sec
Saves Damage Taken, up to 100% of Max HP, as Fury, and reduces cooldown in proportion to amount saved. Your current Fury amount decreases by 7% periodically.
After the skill ends, any saved Fury, plus 1% of max HP will come back to you as damage 25 time(s). This damage cannot kill you by itself.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, you cannot go below 1 HP and upon using an Exceed attack, an additional attack appears
details: All damage taken will be stored as "Rage" (up to 100% of Max HP)<bp_Rage will slowly decay while the skill is active_Cooldown of the additional attack is reduced based on your Rage_At the end of the skill, you will take damage equal to the Rage stored but it cannot kill you_>
Additional attack has increased %Ignore DEF and ignores Damage Reflect
Pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the skill early
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/nether-shield.png} tip={Nether Shield (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Nether Shield
masteryCore.shortDesc: HP Cost: 8% of Max HP, Number of Shields: 3, Damage: 840%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Number of Attacks: 8 per shield\nWhen a single boss monster is hit repeatedly, Final Damage: -30%\nCooldown: 6 sec
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-execution.png} tip={Exceed: Execution (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Exceed: Execution
masteryCore.shortDesc: HP Cost: 4%, Damage: 980%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 4\nEnemy DEF Ignored: 35%.
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/exceed-lunar-slash.png} tip={Exceed: Lunar Slash (3rd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Exceed: Lunar Slash
masteryCore.shortDesc: HP Cost: 3%, Damage: 1143%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 10
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: Maximal Exceed
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Desperado is created for every enemy Exceed lands on. Damage: 2400%, Number of Attacks: 7
Cooldown decreases 0.3 sec when current HP is higher than 10% and lower than 75% of max HP, or decreases 4 sec when current HP is lower than 10% of max HP
Cooldown doesn't decrease to below 1 sec
Cooldown: 6 sec
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 4th Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/infernal-exceed.png} tip={Infernal Exceed (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/demon-avenger/thousand-swords.png} tip={Thousand Swords (Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Thousand Swords
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Max HP Cost: 15%, Exceed Overload: +5
Damage: 900%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 14
Cooldown: 8 sec.
[Passive Effect: HEXA Exceed: Execution Damage: +295% points]
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Infernal Exceed
masteryCore.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Chance to deliver an extra attack when Exceed lands: 80%, Damage: 405%, Bonus Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 2
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

skillCore.name: Requiem
skillCore.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 15% of Max HP, invincible during casting
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 10, Chase Cuts: 50, then summons Demon Requiem Sword
Demon Requiem Sword - Duration: 15 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 2270%, Number of Attacks: 12
Using skill again after 4 sec of summoning, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1255%, Number of Attacks: 14, Demon Sword Roar Activations: 46, invincible and ignores status effects during casting of Demon Sword Roar
Demon Sword summon and roar activate Infernal Exceed
Cooldown: 360 sec

boostCore.name: Revenant Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Revenant Final Damage: +60%, Duration: increased to 18 sec., decreases max savable Fury and Fury to decrease Thorn of Fury cooldown by 60%

meta: Demon Avenger is HP warrior class part of the Demons & Resistance class group. Demon Avengers use HP for their attacks and do not have an MP resource. As well, instead of scaling off of STR like regular warriors, Demon Avengers' damage scales off of HP
